info.description: Views Ad Experience Report data, and gets a list of sites that have a significant number of annoying ads.
info.title: Ad Experience Report

get.description: Lists sites with Ad Experience Report statuses of "Failing" or "Warning".
Gets a summary of the ad experience rating of a site.

parameters.description:
The required site name. It should be the site property whose ad experiences
may have been reviewed, and it should be URL-encoded. For example,
sites/https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com. The server will return an error of
BAD_REQUEST if this field is not filled in. Note that if the site property
is not yet verified in Search Console, the reportUrl field returned by the
API will lead to the verification page, prompting the user to go through
that process before they can gain access to the Ad Experience Report.
parameters.name: name

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.
fields.name: fields

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.
key.name: key

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.
oauth_token.name: oauth_token

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.
prettyPrint.name: prettyPrint

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.
quotaUser.name: quotaUser

scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/xapi.zoo: Test scope for access to the Zoo service
Test scope for access to the Zoo service

PlatformSummary.description: Summary of the ad experience rating of a site for a specific platform.

betterAdsStatus.description: The status of the site reviewed for the Better Ads Standards.

enforcementTime.description: The date on which ad filtering begins.

filterStatus.description: The ad filtering status of the site.

lastChangeTime.description: The last time that the site changed status.

region.description: The assigned regions for the site and platform.

reportUrl.description: A link that leads to a full ad experience report.

underReview.description: Whether the site is currently under review.

reviewedSite.description: The name of the site reviewed.

violatingSites.description: A list of summaries of violating sites.
